Techniques.name: Heaven-Splitting Slash
Techniques.description: A sword technique that cuts through dimensional fabric. Forbidden in mortal realms.

Techniques.name: Shadow Step
Techniques.description: Instant movement between shadows. Ideal for assassins and spies.

Relics & Artifacts.name: Mirror of Echoed Time
Relics & Artifacts.description: Shows possible futures when blood is spilled on its surface.

Relics & Artifacts.name: Phoenix Feather Cloak
Relics & Artifacts.description: Grants fire immunity and regeneration from one mortal wound.

Tomes & Knowledge.name: Codex of the First Flame
Tomes & Knowledge.description: An ancient grimoire that reveals elemental manipulation secrets.

Essences & Cores.name: Infernal Core
Essences & Cores.description: A condensed soul of a lava beast. Can be consumed to gain fire-aligned essence.

Titles & Blessings.name: Blessing of the Moonless Night
Titles & Blessings.description: Enhances stealth, charisma under starlight, and mind resistance.

Summons & Contracts.name: Contract of the Azure Wyrm
Summons & Contracts.description: Binds a minor sky-dragon to your service for one full arc.
